name: 黃啟榮
objective:
1. Introduction 
2. Protocol and Architecture 
3. Data Link Control 
4. Circuit Switching 
5. Packet Switching 
6. LAN Technology 
7. LAN Systems 
8. Internetwork Protocols 
9. Transport Protocols 
10. Network Security 
11. Distributed Applications
schedule:
1	加選 、開場及分組
2	Wireshark and Packet analysis
3	TCP Server and TCP Client
4	UDP Server and UDP Client
5	TCP application Chat
6	TCP application Telnet
7	UDP application Audio
8	TCP application FTP Client
9	Midterm and Final Project Plan
10	TCP application FTP Server
11	TCP application FTP Server
12	TCP and UDP mixed application  Chat
13	TCP and UDP mixed application VoIP SIP Register session
14	TCP and UDP mixed application VoIP SIP Invite session
15	TCP and UDP mixed application VoIP Make Call 
16	TCP and UDP mixed application VoIP Make Call by Server
17	Demo Final Project
18	Demo Final Project
scorePolicy:
期末專題 2人一組
專題內容: 
1.	TCP or UDP
2.	Text or Audio
3.	Client and Server
4.	Client 具備簡單介面
5.	設計圖及工作分配
6.	專題報告

計分方式:
1.	每次上課作業登記 	50%
2.	期中考筆試及上機	20%
3.	期末考Project		30%
materials:
電腦網際網路(第五版)
Computer Network: A Top-Down Approach 5/E		ISBN: 978-986-154-977-4
